verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] become more important to his devotees than the party he represents or the health of the nation , as a whole .
[ARG1: Donald Trump] has [V: become] [ARG2: more important to his devotees than the party he represents or the health of the nation , as a whole] .
Donald Trump has become more important to his devotees than [ARG1: the party] [ARG0: he] [V: represents] or the health of the nation , as a whole .
